title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.5 - Physician's assistants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 52.5 - Physician's assistants

State Regulations
(a) Sponsorship. A program for the training of physician's assistants may be
offered by institutions of higher education in cooperation with acceptable
hospital or clinical facilities, or by accredited teaching hospitals, or by
educational medical facilities of the United States government, or by such
other institutions that have adequate clinical training facilities. (b) Duration. A program shall include not
less than 40 weeks of supervised clinical training and 32 semester hours or the
equivalent of classroom work. (c) Admissions. Admission requirements shall include successful completion of a
four-year course of study in an approved secondary school. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
52.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
